iati-activity.title: New Nicosia Waste Water Treatment Plant
iati-activity.description: The project for the new Nicosia Waste Water Treatment Plant aims to promote and facilitate access to wastewater services to both communities of Nicosia as a fundamental contribution to the on-going peace and confidence building process.

iati-activity.title: Nicosia WasteWater Treat.Plant
iati-activity.description: The project for the new Nicosia Waste Water Treatment Plant (NWWTP) aims to promote and facilitate access to waste water services to both communities of Nicosia as a fundamental contribution to the on-going peace and confidence building process.
